verses.1: Topa phat un. Topa zahtakin a thupiaknate nuam a sa mahmah mi, thupha ngah mi ahi hi.
verses.2: Ama suanlekhakte leitungah vanglian dinga, a lungsim thutang miteʼ suanlekhakte thupha kipia ding hi.
verses.3: Hauhna le nopsaknate a innkuan sungah dim dinga, ama thumanna kip tawntung ding hi.
verses.4: Lungsim thutangte adingin khuamial sung panin khuavak hong taang khia hi. Topa dik a, hehpihna nei-in, amah thuman hi.
verses.5: Cingh gamtatin mite tungah leitawi pia a, thutangin a gamta mite tungah thu a hoih hi.
verses.6: Amah kiliing lo taktak dinga, kiphawk tawntung ding hi.
verses.7: Amah in thusia zak ding lau lo hi. Topa muang a, ama lungsim a kip hi.
verses.8: Amah lau loin, lunghimawh loin om hithiat a, amah a langpangte a guallelh ding a thei tel hi.
verses.9: Amah in hawm khia zuahzuah a, mizawngte tungah a pia khia hi. Ama migitna kip tawntung a, amah vanglianin kipahtawi ding hi.
verses.10: Migilo in hih thu mu-in a heh suak mahmah a, a ha gawigawi-in a tui mang hi. Migiloteʼ lametna a mawkna a suakta hi.
